ratings.comment: Samina is very sweet, but her lectures are almost painful to sit through. The slides are way too dense and there is too much information to absorb in the time given. It's almost as if she's speaking a stream-of-consciousness on the topic rather than teaching. The average test score is low but she curves high.

She is a very sweet person and super accommodating if you need the recordings you can just ask, but her exams are SO SO hard and it is nearly impossible to complete the study guide. I attended most lectures but found myself just copying the super dense slides. She did get thrown into the course last minute so it may improve with time.

The class material is interesting, yet Samina makes it quite boring.  The weekly assignments are online & easy, but average exam scores for this class were terrible.  Her notes are not helpful and she didn't seem to know what she was talking about.  She is a nice woman and very accommodating, just a bad professor.  I didn't learn much from her.

Samina makes a super interesting topic quite literally the most boring and difficult class I have taken thus far. To be fair, she does seem like a good person who got thrown into teaching this at the last minute. Because of this, her slides are impossible to follow and the class is disorganized. She is super soft spoken and hard to follow.

Part 1: Samina found a way to make an easy class difficult.  Her lecture notes contain useless/confusing examples & speaking notes for herself rather than things that are useful to look back on. Her voice is monotoned & the lectures are unbearable to get through.  You're better off skipping the lectures & learning the material through the textbook

The class just wasn't structured well at all. Going to lectures was really boring and mostly not worth one's time. The study guides for the exam are helpful, but like 40 pages altogether and was way too much. The course content was interesting. The class had easy ways to get a good grade, however. I would try to take from another professor.

She spitballs an insane amount of material in lecture. The amount of content she teaches is insane. On top of lectures you have to read the ENTIRE textbook. Her exams are not easy and her study guides take hours to complete. The study guides are roughly 20 pages, size 12 font typed-out once you answers the questions. Would not recommend to anyone.

Samina's kind &tries her best to accommodate w/ students. exams are difficult &uncurved scores are VERY low but it's curved high. Grade's dependent on weekly reading quizzes(not difficult, many attempts), 3 midterms, final, 3 news reflections (300 words max) & discussion participation(turning in a worksheet).  Lecture not mandatory & posted online.
